pageContext.claim: “We have jobs, we have -- people get tremendous anxiety and depression, and you have suicides over things like this when you have terrible economies. You have death. Probably and -- I mean, definitely would be in far greater numbers than the numbers that we're talking about with regard to the virus.”
pageContext.analysis: The suicide rate increased during the recession, but more people had already died around the world from covid-19 when Trump made this remark than died of suicide during that time.
